dev.nokee.platform.base

Interface BinaryView<T extends Binary>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the elements in this view

    public interface BinaryView<T extends Binary>
    A view of the binaries that are created and configured as they are required.
    Since:
    0.3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configureEach(Action<? super T> action)
      Registers an action to execute to configure each binary in the view.
      <S extends T>
      void      		 configureEach(Class<S> type, Action<? super S> action)
      Registers an action to execute to configure each binary in the view.
      Provider<Set<? extends T>> getElements()
      Returns the contents of this view as a Provider of <T> instances.
      <S extends T>
      BinaryView<S>      		 withType(Class<S> type)
      Returns a binary view containing the objects in this collection of the given type.

    • Method Detail

      • configureEach

        void configureEach(Action<? super T> action)
        Registers an action to execute to configure each binary in the view. The action is only executed for those binaries that are required. Fails if any binary has already been finalized.
        Parameters:
        action - The action to execute on each binary for configuration.

      • configureEach

        <S extends T> void configureEach(Class<S> type,
                                 Action<? super S> action)
        Registers an action to execute to configure each binary in the view. The action is only executed for those elements that are required. Fails if any matching element has already been finalized. This method is equivalent to binaries.withType(Foo).configureEach { ... }.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The base type of the binary to configure.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of binary to select.
        action - The action to execute on each element for configuration.

      • withType

        <S extends T> BinaryView<S> withType(Class<S> type)
        Returns a binary view containing the objects in this collection of the given type. The returned collection is live, so that when matching objects are later added to this collection, they are also visible in the filtered binary view.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The base type of the new binary view.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of binary to find.
        Returns:
        The matching binaries. Returns an empty collection if there are no such objects in this collection.

      • getElements

        Provider<Set<? extends T>> getElements()
        Returns the contents of this view as a Provider of <T> instances.

        The returned Provider is live, and tracks changes of the view.

        Returns:
        a provider containing all the elements included in this view.
